mapper.insert: INSERT INTO takku_settlement ( funding_id, store_id, fee, amount, status, settled_at ) VALUES ( #{fundingId}, #{storeId}, #{fee}, #{amount}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT settlement_id, funding_id, store_id, fee, amount, status, settled_at FROM takku_settlement WHERE store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY settled_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE takku_settlement SET status = #{status}, settled_at = NOW() WHERE settlement_id = #{settlementId}
